p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; padding: 0pt 0pt 10pt; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 11.2px; line-height: 1.22318; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

span.style: font-size: 16pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #222222;

p.span: Chromebook Repair Process

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; padding: 0pt 0pt 10pt; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 11.2px; line-height: 1.22318; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

span.style: font-size: 14pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #222222;

p.span: As part of the district’s one-to-one initiative, students in grades 6 through 11 were previously assigned and have been utilizing Chromebooks. To assist with trouble-shooting and servicing these district-provided devices while school is not in session an assistance program will begin

span.style: font-size: 14pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #222222;

p.span: Thursday, March 19, 2020

span.style: font-size: 14pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #222222;

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; padding: 0pt 0pt 10pt; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 11.2px; line-height: 1.22318; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

span.style: font-size: 14pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #222222;

p.span: In the event that assistance is needed with a student’s district-provided Chromebook, please use the following contact information to either call or email with a detailed description of the device’s operating status.

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; padding: 0pt 0pt 10pt; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 11.2px; line-height: 1.22318; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

span.style: font-size: 14pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #222222;

p.span: Email

span.style: font-size: 14pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #222222;
font-size: 14pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc;

p.span: ChromeBookRepair@shufsd.org

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; padding: 0pt 0pt 10pt; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 11.2px; line-height: 1.22318; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

span.style: font-size: 14pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #222222;

p.span: Phone

span.style: font-size: 14pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #222222;

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; padding: 0pt 0pt 10pt; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 11.2px; line-height: 1.22318; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

span.style: font-size: 14pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #222222;

p.span: Hours of operation:

span.style: font-size: 14pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #222222;

p.span: daily from

span.style: font-size: 14pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #222222;
font-size: 14pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #222222;

p.span: 9 a.m. to 12 p.m.(provided that JKAO remains available to employees and public)

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; padding: 0pt 0pt 10pt; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 11.2px; line-height: 1.22318; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 10pt; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 11.2px; line-height: 1.22318; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

span.style: font-size: 14pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #222222;

p.span: Process details:

ul.style: font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 11.2px; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

li.style: font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; list-style-type: disc; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; white-space: pre;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: 'Times New Roman';
font-size: 14pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Attempts to troubleshoot remotely will be made if possible

li.style: font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; list-style-type: disc; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; white-space: pre;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: 'Times New Roman';
font-size: 14pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: If troubleshooting remotely is not an option, an

span.style: font-size: 14pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: appointment

span.style: font-size: 14pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: will be scheduled for the student/parent to bring the Chromebook into the immediate front area of the main lobby at the James Kaden Administrative Offices (JKAO),60 Weston Street.

span.style: font-size: 14pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: (We will minimize person to person contact to adhere to current guidance)

li.style: font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; list-style-type: disc; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; white-space: pre;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: 'Times New Roman';
font-size: 14pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Appointments will be 15 minutes maximum in length and scheduled 20 minutes apart

li.style: font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; list-style-type: disc; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; white-space: pre;

span.style: font-size: 7pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: 'Times New Roman';
font-size: 14pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: A Technician will look at and decide whether the Chromebook needs to be sent out for repair or if it can be fixed in house. If the Chromebook needs to be sent out, an available loaner Chromebook will be assigned to the student. Repairs may take up to two weeks from start to finish

li.style: font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; list-style-type: disc; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; white-space: pre;

span.style: font-size: 14pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: When completed we will call or email the parent/student to come back and pick up the repaired device and return the loaner

li.style: font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 14pt; font-family: Arial; list-style-type: disc; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; white-space: pre;

span.style: font-size: 14pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: In the event that face-to-face service is no longer available due to mandatory State regulations, assistance would still be offered remotely via the email address

p.style: margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 10pt; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 11.2px; line-height: 1.38; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.style: font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 11.2px; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

span.style: font-size: 14px; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #58595b;

p.span: Click

a.style: color: blue; text-decoration-line: none; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 14px; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; background-color: #ffffff; cursor: pointer;

span.style: font-size: 14px; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #58595b;

p.span: to view information about emergency child care with The YMCA.

span.style: font-size: 14px; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #58595b;
color: #58595b; font-family: Verdana; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400;

a.style: text-decoration-line: none; color: blue; cursor: pointer; font-family: Verdana; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; background-color: #ffffff;

span.style: color: #58595b; font-family: Verdana; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400;

span.span: to view information about emergency child care with SCOPE.

p.style: font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 11.2px; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.p: Click HERE to find out more about this program.

p.style: font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 11.2px; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

span.style: font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 11.2px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400;

div.style: padding-right: 10px; padding-bottom: 6px; padding-left: 12px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 14.4px; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; vertical-align: top; min-width: 200px; display: inline-block; float: right;

a.style: color: #360202; text-decoration-line: none; background-color: transparent; outline: 0px; cursor: pointer;

p.style: margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 11.2px; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

span.style: font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; color: #222222;

a.strong: CLICK HERE TO VIEW LEARNING CONTINUITY INFORMATION WEBSITE

p.style: margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 10px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 11.2px; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

span.style: font-size: small; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #222222;

p.span: This website will host all links and resources designed to help parents and students stay connected and engaged during our Coronavirus related closure. Within the site, you will find learning continuity activities, resources for technical support, and all messages from Dr. Bennardo. This site in no way replaces your important classroom work or teacher contact but instead, will help organize the various supplemental resources during this unfortunate situation.
